componentDescription: Renders a customizable data table with optional footer and caption.

data.description: Array of data objects to be displayed in the table rows.

typeValues: array of objects with at least field and title as string properties
columns.description: Configurations for each column in the table, including header titles.

typeValues: array of objects with at least value as a string and props as an optional object
footer.description: Optional array of footer cells to add at the bottom of the table.

caption.description: Optional table caption as a React node.

typeValues: object with optional style properties for table, thead, tbody, tr, th, td
styles.description: Optional custom styles to apply to the table and its elements.
